main event: A faster than ordinary radar target was detected over Westover AFB, Massachusetts on 17 July 1956, exhibiting unusual acceleration and maneuverability.
interesting points: The object made a 180-degree turn in less than 6 seconds,The object accelerated and decelerated rapidly,All other traffic was accounted for during the observation,The sighting lasted approximately 4 minutes,The object was recorded at speeds of up to 2400 miles per hour.
